{"id":480794419,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1618457110,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"40 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/480794419/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"39.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int max_area = 0;\n        std::map<std::pair<int, int>, bool> seen;\n        for(int i = 0; i < grid.size(); i++)\n        {\n            for(int j = 0; j < grid[0].size(); j++)\n            {\n                max_area = std::max(max_area, area(seen, grid, i, j));\n            }\n        }\n        return max_area;\n    }\n    int area(std::map<std::pair<int, int>, bool> &seen, vector<vector<int>>& grid, int i, int j)\n    {\n        int res = 0;\n        if(!seen[{i, j}] && grid[i][j] == 1)\n        {\n            seen[{i, j}] = true;\n            res++;\n            if(i - 1 >= 0)\n            {\n                res += area(seen, grid, i - 1, j);\n            }\n            if(i + 1 < grid.size())\n            {\n                res += area(seen, grid, i + 1, j);\n            }\n            if(j - 1 >= 0)\n            {\n                res += area(seen, grid, i, j - 1);\n            }\n            if(j + 1 < grid[0].size())\n            {\n                res += area(seen, grid, i, j + 1);\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
